If you want to change it, replace the number in the middle with the BPM of your project.

BROADCAST_INPUT: Remove polo function but not from the button, from just clicking on them like a normal human being

XaUz]B7G62v!QFj14td{.text:
--READ THIS PLEASE--
(you can delete these 2 blocks after)

- These 2 blocks do the same thing, but the red block will only change the costume if the polo is not muted. 

- Use the red block instead of the purple one when making animations. 

- If you don't use the red block, the polo will try to do it's animation while muted, and that will cause it to stutter

- The only drawback to using the red block is that you have to type in the name of the costume instead of selecting it from the drop-down menu that the purple block has.

- If you have any questions, ask me in the comments.

f(6aHg-RP}iAQ)WC7Xpi.text: This is the code for the previously mentioned red block. First, it checks if the current polo that this sprite is located on is muted. Then it either sets this sprite to the specified costume, or sets it to the default.

@8Hu@TN?+)jER-=?h*O5.text: Plays the sound for each loop, and disables the polo if it is muted.

[]{Zfv*iP:{WU_UHDQu~.text: Constantly disables the polo if it is muted, or enables it if it is not muted.

ei(`an@j*fVjQre`dMK^.text: When you remove a soloed character, the rest get unmuted

LE+fHQ4(OiDTK4lVYkt=.text: Update: change this to a  0 if you want to override the system above.

Xh.text: In this and identical sprites you need to add design, animation and sound for first and second loops.

;.c)]8u8W@Y-`dc#/[*].text: To change the tempo (BPM) of the project, go to the stage tab and change the value of BPM.

Xj.text:
All the icons are in the same sprite. You just need to insert your icons into the costumes. There are 3 icon positions for every sound: a - normal, b - dragged (have a shadow), and c - putted. 

ATTENTION: Do not change costume names, otherwise the project will not run properly

Xg.text: Create a preview art so people could be interested in your project. To make it visible, just stop the project and save it before leaving.
